Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class SchoolBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.StudentAccessiblePiece
it.polimi.ingsw.model.SchoolBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SchoolBoard extends StudentAccessiblePiece implements Serializable
Class for School Boards, inherits HashSetstudents from StudentAccessiblePiece, which is used to save students in the entrance
